quote: There is something in the nature of tea that leads us into a world of quiet contemplation of life.
author: Lin Yutang

quote: Tea is a part of daily life. It is as simple as eating when hungry and drinking when thirsty.
author: Yamamoto Soshun

quote: No matter where you are in the world, you are at home when tea is served.
author: Earlene Grey

quote: When tea becomes ritual, it takes its place at the heart of our ability to see greatness in small things.
author: Muriel Barbery

quote: The tea session is modeled after the silence of retreat; a time to enjoy life far removed from daily existence.
author: Sen Joo

quote: There is no trouble so great or grave that cannot be diminished by a nice cup of tea.
author: Bernard-Paul Heroux

quote: The spirit of the tea beverage is one of peace, comfort and refinement.
author: Arthur Gray

quote: Tea time is a chance to slow down, pull back and appreciate our surroundings.
author: Letitia Baldrige

quote: If you are cold, tea will warm you; if you are too heated, it will cool you; If you are depressed, it will cheer you; If you are excited, it will calm you.
author: William Ewart Gladstone

quote: Tea is the magic key to the vault where my brain is kept.
author: Frances Hardinge
